## Experimental.FormattersByExtendedTarget type

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

A collection of [formatters](./ts-extras.experimental.formatter.md) indexed by target name, to enable different format methods per output target.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type FormattersByExtendedTarget<TFT extends FormatTargets, T> = Record<TFT, Formatter<T>>;
```
**References:** [FormatTargets](./ts-extras.experimental.formattargets.md)<!-- -->, [Formatter](./ts-extras.experimental.formatter.md)
